title: New: London Grammar – Metal & Dust
content:
The weekend is nearly upon us, and with it comes a new cut from London Grammar, Metal & Dust, the a-side to their debut 7” single.

The first leak from the split single, Hey Now, took the blog world by storm when it was dropped towards the tail end of last year. Metal & Dust is arguably a better track, the hook, “we argue we don’t fight/stay awake until the middle of the night” holds a surprising amount of resonance. We’re all been there of course, now someone’s said it I suppose?

London’s Grammar’s debut 7” drops on the 25th of Feb and they’ll be playing Elektrowerkz in London on March 27.
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d24
